summary: The bill, titled the "Modernize Diplomatic Security Training Act," amends the Omnibus Diplomatic Security and Antiterrorism Act of 1986. It mandates specific, substantive, and mandatory counterintelligence training for Diplomatic Security special agents assigned to positions with a primary counterintelligence role or those posted to high-risk, high-threat locations. The training will be provided by the Office of Counterintelligence of the Department of State.
